It's happening! 9 days from now (Nov. 16, 2018) is the PLDI 2019 paper deadline. Assemble your favorite 12 pages of your best new PL research ideas, put them in a manuscript, and get that puppy submitted! https://t.co/bBTtyqyRNq

— PLDI (@PLDI) November 7, 2018

It’s PLDI day! Remember:
- double-blind: remove the authors
- 12 pages, *excluding* bibliography
- sigplanconf.cls with *10pt* option
